name: Google Cloud Study Jam Yola
description:
• What we'll do
Learn the fundamentals of the Google Cloud Platform, how to run containers on it and how to use the platform for data engineering.

• What to bring
Notebook, Laptop

• Important to know

name: International Women's Day Yola 2018

venue.name: Ahmadu Ribadu College
venue.address_1: Off Lamido Zubairu Way, Yola Bye Pass
venue.address_2: Off Lamido Zubairu Way, Yola Bye Pass

description:
• What we'll do

International Women's Day (IWD) is marked on March 8th every year. In different regions, the focus of celebrations ranges from general respect and appreciation toward women to a celebration of women's economic, political, and social achievements.
International Women's Day is an important moment to recognize how women have influenced the tech industry and beyond.
The purpose of this event is to create a supportive global community in which women can connect, be inspired, and encourage each other to realize their passions.
We are celebrating here in Yola on 31-March-2018

• What to bring
Laptop, Notebook and Pen

• Important to know

name: Build Actions for Your Community (Google Assistant Meetup)
description:
• What we'll do
Actions on Google and Google Assistant are one of the major Google technical areas and we want to invite the whole developer community to learn about creating Actions for the Google Assistant.

• What to bring
Laptop, Macbook, Chrome or any PC.

• Important to know
Please come along with your computer.

name: TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended  Yola 2018
description: TensorFlow Dev Summit Extended, Yola is an event that brings developers, students, tech enthusiasts and machine learning users, to know latest update and technology advancement about machine learning as well as getting up to date information on TensorFlow. It also features a viewing session of the TensorFlow Dev Summit 2018.

name: Google I/O Extended 2018 Yola
description:
Google IO:

Google I/O Extended Yola is an event focused on bringing local developer community together to experience the keynote and other main Google I/O sessions, in real-time. We will also offer other unique activities targeted to developers, such as hackathons and codelabs.

Feauturing Flutter Extended:

Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

Fast Development:
Hot Reload in milliseconds to paint your app to life. Use a rich set of fully-customizable widgets to build native interfaces in minutes.

Expressive and Flexible UI:
Quickly ship features with a focus on native end-user experiences. Layered architecture allows full customization, which results in incredibly fast rendering and expressive and flexible designs.

Native Performance:
Flutter’s widgets incorporate all critical platform differences such as scrolling, navigation, icons and fonts to provide full native performance on both iOS and Android.

name: Bug-free Programming with SPARK Ada
description:
During this workshop, you’ll learn what makes the Ada programming language special and why you should use it, how to write bug-free code with SPARK Ada and how to implement the stack data structure in SPARK Ada.

- Registration (20 min)
- Introductions and Networking (25 min)
- Installations (15 min)
- Testing Codes (30 min)
- Writing bug-free code (45 min)
- Break (15 min)
- Implementation (30 min)
- Demos (20 min)
- Pictures (15 min)

name: Zero To App (Android + Firebase)
description:
What we’ll do
- Registration (30 min)
- Introductions (10 min)
- Live Coding (120 min)
- Q&A (30 min)
- Mingling (30 min)

name: DevFest 2018 Yola "Build for Digital Wellbeing"
description:
GDG DevFest 2018 is our annual developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

This year's theme is: Building for Digital Wellbeing.

This is a gathering of developers (from Jalingo, Gombe, Maiduguri and Yola) and Google technology enthusiasts which will cover multiple product areas such as Android, Firebase, Android Things, Flutter, Google Cloud Platform, Google Assistant, IoT, Machine Learning, Mobile Web and Artificial intelligence.

This event will feature speaker sessions, codelabs and a full day [day 2] hackathon.

P.S: There will be lots of freebies and swags for everyone! RSVP now, and ensure you give us your email address and phone number.

name: Local Hack Day 2018
description:
Now is the time if you haven't heard of Local Hack Day before, it's a global hackathon and celebration of learning, building, and sharing! Whether you're a first timer who is learning to program or you go to hackathons every weekend, this event is for you.

Local Hack Day events will be taking place in more than 200 cities around the world, so it's easy to find a location nearby. We hope you'll join us for one of the biggest days of hacking ever, with more than 6,000 hackers just like you. We can't wait to see what you build!

Build for VR or AR and get extra special bonus swags!

Winners go away with prizes ranging from Sticker Pack to T-shirts.

Click on "Going" and RSVP now using the link to get your ticket http://bit.ly/hackyola2018.

You don't wanna miss all the freebies!

name: Cloud Study Jam Yola
description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.

Also there will be a live Firebase session to teach you how to develop apps with Firebase.

Track One:
In this track we'll work through several Google Cloud lab together, you will get learn about Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud and or Machine Learning.

Track Two: [Optional]
In this track you will learn how use Firebase features like Cloud Firestore, Analytics, and Authentication in your apps.

Gift: Free Space for 2 apps on Google Playstore will be given to best participant from each track and $50 Qwiklabs credit to continue doing what you do best.

Interesting? RSVP now:

name: IWD 19 Yola
description: International Women's Day 2019 Yola is aimed for general respect and appreciation towards women to a celebration of women's economic, political and social achievements.
